Package mediator

Class Client

java.lang.Object
mediator.Client
All Implemented Interfaces:
Remote, Model, utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<Object,Object>, utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<Object,Object>, utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<Object,Object>, utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<Object,Object>
public class Client extends Object implements Model, utility.observer.listener.RemoteListener<Object,Object>
A class that will be exposed as a remote object using RMI, so that the server can call methods on it. This is also a RemoteListener which allows it to react to changes in a RemoteSubject, like the server's RemoteModel. Mostly this class will delegate actual work to the remote model.
Version:
1.4.0 - May 2024
Author:
Alexandru Tofan, Supendra Bogati

    • addListener

      public boolean addListener(utility.observer.listener.GeneralListener<Object,Object> listener, String... propertyNames)
      Add a local listener to this local subject.
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.GeneralSubject<Object,Object>
      Specified by:
      addListener in interface utility.observer.subject.LocalSubject<Object,Object>
      Parameters:
      listener - the listener to be added
      propertyNames - a var-args list of property names. If empty, then the listener should be added as a lister for all events.
      Returns:
      true if the listener has been added. It is optional if this return true if the listener has been added to at least one of the property names or if it successfully has been added to all listed
      See Also:
      • LocalSubject
